org.apache.zookeeper.server.quorum

类 LeaderSessionTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.zookeeper.server.quorum.UpgradeableSessionTracker
      • org.apache.zookeeper.server.quorum.LeaderSessionTracker
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SessionTracker

    public class LeaderSessionTracker
extends UpgradeableSessionTracker
    The leader session tracker tracks local and global sessions on the leader.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.zookeeper.server.SessionTracker

        SessionTracker.Session, SessionTracker.SessionExpirer

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.zookeeper.server.quorum.UpgradeableSessionTracker

        localSessionsEnabled, localSessionTracker

      • trackSession

        public boolean trackSession(long sessionId,
                            int sessionTimeout)
        从接口复制的说明: SessionTracker
        Track the session expire, not add to ZkDb.
        参数:
        sessionId - sessionId
        sessionTimeout - sessionTimeout
        返回:
        whether the session was newly tracked (if false, already tracked)

      • commitSession

        public boolean commitSession(long sessionId,
                             int sessionTimeout)
        Synchronized on this to avoid race condition of adding a local session after committed global session, which may cause the same session being tracked on this server and leader.
        参数:
        sessionId - sessionId
        sessionTimeout - sessionTimeout
        返回:
        whether the session was newly added (if false, already existed)

      • touchSession

        public boolean touchSession(long sessionId,
                            int sessionTimeout)
        返回:
        false if session is no longer active

      • createSession

        public long createSession(int sessionTimeout)

      • getServerIdFromSessionId

        public static long getServerIdFromSessionId(long sessionId)

      • checkSession

        public void checkSession(long sessionId,
                         Object owner)
                  throws KeeperException.SessionExpiredException,
                         KeeperException.SessionMovedException,
                         KeeperException.UnknownSessionException
        从接口复制的说明: SessionTracker
        Checks whether the SessionTracker is aware of this session, the session is still active, and the owner matches. If the owner wasn't previously set, this sets the owner of the session. UnknownSessionException should never been thrown to the client. It is only used internally to deal with possible local session from other machine
        抛出:
        KeeperException.SessionExpiredException
        KeeperException.SessionMovedException
        KeeperException.UnknownSessionException

      • checkGlobalSession

        public void checkGlobalSession(long sessionId,
                               Object owner)
                        throws KeeperException.SessionExpiredException,
                               KeeperException.SessionMovedException
        从接口复制的说明: SessionTracker
        Strictly check that a given session is a global session or not
        指定者:
        checkGlobalSession 在接口中 SessionTracker
        覆盖:
        checkGlobalSession 在类中 UpgradeableSessionTracker
        抛出:
        KeeperException.SessionExpiredException
        KeeperException.SessionMovedException

                     Object owner)
              throws KeeperException.SessionExpiredException
